document.full_text: u.n. and french helicopters attacked laurent gbagbo's last strongholds in abidjan on monday as forces loyal to ivory coast presidential claimant alassane ouattara streamed into the city in a "final assault."
document.title: battle rages in ivory coast, u.n. fires on gbagbo bases
lines_and_colors: u.n. and french helicopters attacked laurent gbagbo's last strongholds in abidjan on monday as forces loyal to ivory coast presidential claimant alassane ouattara streamed into the city in a "final assault."
